code: import React from'react';import utils from'../../../common/utils';import constant from'../../../constants/constant';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RowIntroduce(_ref){var introduce=_ref.introduce,handleDelete=_ref.handleDelete,getIdUpdate=_ref.getIdUpdate;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:introduce.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:introduce.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:constant.IMAGE_POST+introduce.image,className:"center-blog",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image-columm",src:constant.IMAGE_POST+introduce.image,alt:introduce.title})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{id:"blog-detail",className:"row-clamp",children:introduce.detail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:utils.convertDateTime(introduce.createDate)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-primary","data-toggle":"modal","data-target":".bd-example-modal-lg",onClick:function onClick(){return getIdUpdate(introduce);},children:"Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:function onClick(){return handleDelete(introduce.id);},children:"Delete"})]})]});}export default RowIntroduce;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import utils from '../../../common/utils' import constant from '../../../constants/constant' function RowIntroduce({introduce,handleDelete,getIdUpdate}) { return ( {introduce.id} {introduce.title} {introduce.detail} {utils.convertDateTime(introduce.createDate)} ) } export default RowIntroduce
